name: Solar System (itch) (mathabs)
description:
Model of the Solar System. Click on planets or comets for the camera to follow them. Made by mathabs. I added these elements:

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Mars
  4. Jupiter
  5. Saturn
  6. Uranus
  7. Neptune
  8. Pluto
  9. Asteroids

Credits:

Brian Winn
